data.taskTitle: when a user creates a new file in /files focus the filename field in the modal that opens
data.approach: Fix autofocus on create modal by using tick() to focus programmatically when modal opens, since HTML autofocus only works on page load

data.taskTitle: when a user creates a new file in /files focus the filename field in the modal that opens
summary: Added input element ref (createNameInputRef) to track the filename input
Made openCreateModal async and added tick() + focus() call after modal renders
Removed autofocus HTML attribute (only works on page load, not dynamic modals)

when a user creates a new file in /files focus the filename field in the modal that opens
summary: Added input element ref (createNameInputRef) to track the filename input
Made openCreateModal async with tick() to wait for DOM render

patterns: Use tick() + programmatic focus for dynamic modal inputs instead of HTML autofocus attribute
gotchas: HTML autofocus only works on initial page load, not when modals are dynamically shown
